price: 1. Mid wax dalbaya baa dalbay in cadaab ku dhacda (gaalada loo soo dedejiyo)2.
footnotes:
1. Al-Macaarij: Waddooyinka kor loogu baxo cirka waa kuwa ay malaa’igta u maraan aadista samooyinka.
 2. Gaaladu waxay ka hor yimaadeen Nabiga s.c.w. iyagoo ka dalbay inuu ku keeno cadaab dushooda.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.
